author: Nicole Wetsman
title: A new COVID-19 test can return results in 5 minutes
description: The test, from the biotechnology company Abbot, can be run in a doctor’s office or an urgent care clinic. Tests for the coronavirus that run quickly and in an office are key to slowing the outbreak.
content:
It can run at urgent care clinics and doctors offices
Abbotts ID NOW system. 
Abbott
A new COVID-19 test from the medical device company Abbott can return positive results in five minutes and it can be run in a doctors office. The test was approved for eme… [+3137 chars]
